|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 4Kc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 200 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV640DBTC-90G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Mira;P3V56S40ETP-G6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Infineon;ADM6996M;ADM6996M, AD0810, HA1Z752010X04; |voip_ports = 2 |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:1E:E5, 00:21:29, 00:22:6B |oui = 00:1E:E5, 00:21:29, 00:22:6B |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2.1.4;; |stockos = Linux;2.4.31;; |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 10 |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = boot log |addchip = Ringing SLIC with Integrated DC/DC Converter;Infineon;PEF 4268 T V1.2;Infineon, PEF 4268 T, V1.2, VE816226N17;2;,,, VINETIC-2AMR Voice Processor;Infineon;PEB 3352 HT V1.2;;,,, Smart Card Reader;ST Microelectronics;GCSIMPRO 1.00;;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = @HomeXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^@Home[0-9A-F]{4}$ |default_ch = |manuf = Tecom |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/07/2007 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 745883575350 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B003UBJZ6G |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2561S;RT2561ST, GY57870G0, 0815ST; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2527; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== 2010-12-16 final firmware version 1.00.25 WRTU54G-TM serial numbers appear to start with '''QMF0'''. "613-180173R" is silkscreened on the board. :This is presumed to be a '''Tecom''' P/N. The default SSID is '''@HomeXXXX''' where '''XXXX''' is the last two octets of the wireless interface MAC address (upper case letters). The power adapter included with the device is a PSA18R-120P (12V, 1.5A). ==Links of Interest== [http://wiki.scottn.us/wrtu54g-tm WRTU54G-TM and OpenWrt] :[http://wiki.scottn.us/wrtu54g-tm:info Info dump] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksys/linksys_wrtu54g-tm |wikipage = |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=16536 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 12.09 |current_supported_version = 12.09 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
JP2

1 [VCC]
2 [TxD]
3 [RxD]
4 [GND]
{{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
